mapper.select: SELECT namespace as "group", name, base_version, COUNT(*) AS count FROM maven2_component WHERE repository_id = #{repositoryId} AND base_version LIKE '%-SNAPSHOT' GROUP BY namespace, name, base_version HAVING COUNT(*) > #{minimumRetained};

SELECT c.*, a.asset_id, a.asset_blob_id, b.blob_created FROM maven2_component c LEFT JOIN maven2_asset as a ON c.component_id = a.component_id LEFT JOIN maven2_asset_blob as b ON a.asset_blob_id = b.asset_blob_id WHERE (c.name = #{name} AND c.namespace = #{group}) AND c.repository_id = #{repositoryId} AND (c.base_version = #{baseVersion} OR c.base_version = #{releaseVersion}) AND c.base_version LIKE '%-SNAPSHOT' ORDER BY version DESC;

SELECT DISTINCT(snapshots.component_id) FROM maven2_component snapshots, maven2_component releases WHERE snapshots.repository_id = #{repositoryId} AND snapshots.name = releases.name AND snapshots.namespace = releases.namespace AND snapshots.base_version LIKE '%-SNAPSHOT' AND snapshots.last_updated <= (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - CAST(#{gracePeriod} AS INT) * INTERVAL '1' DAY) AND releases.base_version = REPLACE(snapshots.base_version, '-SNAPSHOT', '');
